channel.title: Java on Palak Jain
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Palak Jain

item.title: TicTacToe - personal
item.description: This was my first go at a Java project after self-learning for a couple months! It was developed as a simple 2-player game of Tic Tac Toe on a text-based console. The code is broken up into 3 key classes: Main, Board, and Player. This project displays my competence in the basics of Java and object oriented programming. Check out the code on GitHub: https://github.com/pjain062700/TicTacToe
